content: in january 2021 a couple named lord national nurnmer and mrs national nurnmer decided to get a divorce and prepared a legal document with the help of a notary they agreed on the division of their assets including property vehicles and financial accounts as well as the repayment of a mortgage loan they also made arrangements for the custody and care of their children and the division of expenses related to their upbringing the couple renounced any claims for subsistence allowance and made provisions for inheritance rights the document also included a power of attorney for the notary to act on their behalf after the divorce is finalized they need to inform third parties and update their marriage and divorce certificates certain clauses in the agreement will take immediate effect while others will go into effect on a specific date the proceedings were interrupted and the parties requested to be notified about the transfer of the case the property in question is encumbered by a mortgage and a deed involving a sum of money was executed by a notary the parties own a property in ronse belgium and request a reduced tax rate the conditions for the division surrender have been met and the deed has been registered the notary has confirmed the identity of the parties and certified their involvement in the deed this is the final step in the process and the parties acknowledge the responsibilities of the notary and accept the clauses in the document they have received a draft of the document reviewed it and signed it a certified copy has been made
